Class BodyRec

ICS4UProject.GameObject
ICS4UProject.GameObjectRec
ICS4UProject.BodyRec
All Implemented Interfaces:
Body, CameraView, Kinetic, KineticsWithSize, PhysicsUpdate

public class BodyRec extends GameObjectRec implements Body
This is a class represent rectangular a body with javafx rectangle added
